data.name: CDS fix

14/06/19 - уменьшен масштаб, добавлено много нового, часть корректировок взяты из стиля Пахомова А. C. (SC0000161512)
28/03/19 - обновлено для 2.0
02/09/19 - фиксы к июльскому релизу

13/01/20 - правая панель кнопок поднята вверх,

data.name: Dark ReactJS
data.description: Hey 👋🏽 Dark ReactJS is a simple dark mode put together for reactjs.org. Hope you like it! If you find anything improperly styled, feel free to tell me in the form of a review. Made with 💖 by Justin Ikeako.

data.name: Hupu 大字宽屏版
kome/nama【上置きmode】
data.description: おーぷん(Open2ch)の機能を使いやすくするcssです。基本は右置きmodeと同様ですが、上にkome/namaを配置します。 お絵かきはこのモードでは使わないと思うので非表示にして、その位置にボタンを移動します。 右置きと同時に有効にした場合は上置きmodeが優先です。

data.name: kome/nama【右置きmode】
data.description: おーぷん(Open2ch)の機能を使いやすくするcssです。上置きmodeもあります。 ・kome/namaの位置を右に移動、スレと被らない位置へ ・画像を表示してもnamaが消えない、スクロールについてくる ・画像真ん中を右クリックで保存可能 ・1000表示

data.name: Lichess Gothic Pieces
data.description: Just another style I really like.

data.name: Dark Sailsjs
2048: Ice
data.description: 2048 has chilled down from it's orange-like pallet and decided to go blue.

data.name: Roblox Avatar Customization Theme - Town Sidewalk
data.description: Changes the image behind your Roblox character

data.name: Mastodon Full Image Preview and Wider Columns
data.description: Makes Mastodon's columns a bit wider and shows full media/image previews instead of Mastodon's default cropped previews. Customize Settings -Instance Domains- Don't forget to click on Customize Settings to specify your instance's domain! You can specify up to 10 custom Mastodon instances that you want styled. -Column Width- Mastodon's default column width of 350px is overriden to 400px by default with this user style. Under "Customize Settings", you may choose a different value (don't forget the 'px') for the width of the columns before clicking the install button. -Multiple Images- Specify whether images in toots with multiple images use the full width of the Mastodon column or to 2 images per row. --- Got comments? Issues? Feedback? Requests? Contact me: @leonivek@mastodon.social
